setupInstructions.message: Run the following commands to install required testing packages:
setupInstructions.alternativeMethod: Add the PackageReference elements to your .csproj file and run 'dotnet restore'

fileReports.summary: Added comprehensive tests for UnitTest1 class, covering constructor and method invocation scenarios
fileReports.recommendations: Consider adding meaningful implementation to Test1() method to improve testability
keyImprovements: Used FluentAssertions for more readable assertions
fileReports.note: Current implementation is minimal and lacks specific business logic

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for OrderController covering happy path, model validation, serialization, and basic constructor testing
recommendations: Consider making ProducerWrapper more testable by introducing an interface
Add more robust input validation in the controller
Consider logging instead of using Console.WriteLine for production code
keyImprovements: Added test for valid order submission
Added test for invalid model state handling
fileReports.note: Tests assume existence of OrderRequest model with CustomerId, ProductId, and Quantity properties

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ProcessOrdersService with 8 test cases covering constructor initialization, message processing, error handling, and cancellation scenarios
recommendations: Add more detailed logging for better traceability
Consider adding more robust error handling for deserialization
Implement more granular exception handling in message processing
keyImprovements: Covered cancellation and error handling paths
fileReports.note: Tests require mocking of ConsumerWrapper and ProducerWrapper which may need additional configuration

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ProducerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message production, null input handling, and disposal scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding more robust error handling in writeMessage method
Implement logging instead of Console.WriteLine for better testability
Add more detailed exception handling for Kafka-specific errors
fileReports.note: Tests use localhost:9092 as a placeholder. Replace with actual Kafka broker configuration in real-world scenarios.

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ConsumerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message reading, error handling, and disposal scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding more detailed logging in exception handling paths
Implement a more robust message consumption strategy
Add configuration options for timeout and retry mechanisms
keyImprovements: Null config and topic name handling
fileReports.note: Tests use Moq for mocking Kafka consumer and FluentAssertions for more readable assertions

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for OrderRequest model with 8 test methods covering property initialization, enum validation, and various input scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding data validation attributes to properties
Implement custom validation logic for quantity and product name
Add more robust error handling for edge cases
keyImprovements: Validated default and custom constructor behaviors
fileReports.note: Tests focus on model validation and basic property interactions
